participants.name: Carrie Severson
participants.title: Storyteller Trainer for Women in the World

messages.message: Hi Brian ~ Thank you for reaching out! How do you improve the world one question at a time?! Carrie
I suppose the word "world" is relative. What appears to me as an improvement may be insignificant to others. Are self help books fiction or nonfiction?
I hope they'd be nonfiction...although that very question was a topic of conversation with a writer just last week! Are you published?
I'd like to publish someday sure. Not currently.
Well that's what I do so if you have questions about the publishing world, ask!
